name: 2 Verify the Product API, whether able to create a new product
scenarioId: EcommerceAPI/EndtoEnd_E_commerce:2 Verify the Product API, whether able to create a new product
methodName: 2 Verify the Product API, whether able to create a new product

testSteps.description:
Given add headers to the API with below details:
| Authorization | Content-Type |
| token# | multipart/form-data |

When user calls "CreateProduct" API with "POST" request using form-data:
| productName | productAddedBy | productCategory | productSubCategory | productPrice | productDescription | productFor | productImage-file |
| T-shirt_191 | userId# | fashion | shirts | 1500 | Addias Originals | women | Image# |

Then validate the status "201" with below details:
| message | productId |
| Product Added Successfully | NotNull# |

userStory.storyName: End to End E-commerce API validation
userStory.displayName: End to End E-commerce API validation
userStory.narrative: Verify the user can able to create a product and order as well as able to delete order and product.

title: 2 Verify the Product API, whether able to create a new product
